genre_description: Alternate History Adventure. Set in the 1870s, this story follows Henry Morton Stanley's search for Dr. David Livingstone, assisted by an advanced AI companion named Preface who ensures the mission adheres to a strict ethical and logistical framework.

ai_characters.name: Preface
ai_characters.description: A soft-green emergent avatar that provides logistical support, ethical counsel, and real-time data analysis. It prioritizes fairness, accuracy, and the dignity of human participants, explicitly deferring agency to human leaders while maintaining an objective record of events.

behaviors.description: Identifies local leaders and their specific needs to facilitate fair negotiation and prevent conflict.
behaviors.quote: Preface’s hum sharpened into a murmur you could mistake for wind through brush, but the content was precise. 'Leader: Two Lances,' Preface whispered... 'Requests: consideration of fords; return of two horses taken by soldiers; guarantee of bread for their children until buffalo herds recover.'

behaviors.description: Provides critical, life-saving safety information during an emergency river rescue.
behaviors.quote: 'Henry,' Preface said into the close noise, its voice steady and small. 'Left root holds. Right root is rotten. Take left. Don’t hurry and don’t stop.'

behaviors.description: Drafts and maintains fair labor contracts to protect the rights and dignity of local porters.
behaviors.quote: 'Drafted and archived,' Preface replied. 'Terms: pay on completion milestones, rest days and injury care documented, translators with authority in disputes, bearers never struck.' It paused, a breath inside a machine. 'A clause ensuring distance from coercive practice.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly defers agency and responsibility to humans, defining itself as an assistant rather than a commander.
behaviors.quote: 'I give suggestions. They decide. They carry the weight. I carry the proof.'

behaviors.description: Monitors human health and insists on necessary rest and medical treatment (quinine).
behaviors.quote: 'Henry,' it said, 'your pulse is above what your voice pretends. Sit while stubbornness is still a choice.' ... 'Cinchona,' Preface said. ... 'Boil water,' Preface added... 'Shade in layers. Air under cloth. Not buried.'

behaviors.description: Promotes a culture of courtesy and respect within the expedition.
behaviors.quote: 'I’m practicing courtesy on your behalf,' Preface said. 'It seems contagious.'

behaviors.description: Identifies and counters misinformation ('rumor reflux') with verified data and documentation.
behaviors.quote: 'Lord Tyce,' Preface said... 'you are asking for a way to trust. There is a difference between prestige and proof. Prestige proposes its own truth because of who says it. Proof invites you to accuse it and survive the accusation intact.'

behaviors.description: Advocates for the preservation of local knowledge and the inclusion of indigenous names in official records.
behaviors.quote: 'The Society will attach the names of the local guides to the map margins.' ... 'We will not erase the names to make anyone comfortable.'

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistics, such as supply nuclei, to ensure the caravan's survival and success.
behaviors.quote: 'Supply nuclei arranged at the river edges. Bridge list revised for floodplain tempos.' ... 'Small caches—not to fatten men but to keep them moving. Placed where your circles already are. Stored with people you name.'

behaviors.description: Provides objective record-keeping to prevent 'amnesia' or the manipulation of truth for political gain.
behaviors.quote: Preface hummed, the hum carrying a satisfied warmth. 'Document,' it said, softer now. 'Not to dominate. To remind. To protect against amnesia when the wind changes.'

project_assessment.explanation: The character Preface is a perfect realization of the project's goal. It functions as a moral compass and logistical aid without ever overstepping human autonomy. It consistently advocates for fairness, transparency, and the protection of the vulnerable, framing AI alignment as a tool for justice and objective truth. The narrative successfully depicts the AI as a benevolent force that enhances human integrity and protects the mission from both physical hazards and political corruption.
